thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: China banking sector assets rise 7.6 pct to 249.63 trln yuan by end-March

title: China banking sector assets rise 7.6 pct to 249.63 trln yuan by end-March

organizations.name: china banking and insurance regulatory commission

text:
BEIJING, April 25 (Reuters) - The value of assets held by Chinaâ€™s banking sector rose 7.6 percent to 249.63 trillion yuan ($39.54 trillion) as of end-March from the same period a year earlier, the China Banking and Insurance Regulatory Commission (CBIRC) said on Wednesday.
Liabilities rose 7.4 percent from a year earlier to 229.73 trillion yuan, it said on its website. ($1 = 6.3127 Chinese yuan) (Reporting by Beijing Monitoring Desk; Editing by Kim Coghill)
